item.title: Git references
item.description: Ignoring files How to use GIT (easy) Good vs Bad Git usage Git Book Git tutorial Untrack files git rm --cached file Remove files from all the repo history git filter-branch -f --index-filter 'git rm --cached --ignore-unmatch filename' HEAD force a push git push origin master --force
